abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 2 cards of any player's deck or at up to 2 of any player's Prizes. Put any cards you looked at back in the same order. This power can't be used if Noctowl is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.
